> Perceptor Freed Zarak from his straps, belts and cables tookign Zarak 
> drags him towads the exit and screaming to his follower said "LEt's 
> go out here!!!!"
> 
> Then he ran as far as he could towards the exit

Zarak, quickly freed from his restraints sat up and looked around. He glanced at Perceptor and then the rest of them as he took in the situation. "NO!" Zarak said, his voice firm and unyielding. "You want to leave Skorponok here?"

Zarak laughed, "You forget how I and he are connected Perceptor." With a simple glance at the console 'Scorponok' began to rumble as its engines started, for a moment it began to move foward before it came to a jarring halt!

Zarak frown, "The fols have me tethered down." He looked over at Perceptor, "Outside they have us pinned down! Destroy it and we can get out of here!"

From outside, the voice continued its inexorable countdown, "37 . . . 36 . . . 35 . . . 

(TAG: Perceptor)


> Darkfate followed Maurader as fast as he could, holding his 
> uncounceous friend Nightstrike

Marauder continued without stopping, without seeming to even pay attention to those behind him. However he did seem to know where he was going, as he ignored different off shoots from thier path, then taking one turn and then another. Always the light before them was growing slowly brighter and brighter, and they had come nearly a mile from thier previous location. 

Meanwhile the familiar voice of Vorpal comes over Darkfate's radio, "Darkfate! Report!"

(TAG: Darkfate)

Preston
